title: Struggling With Niche Research? Try This Free KDP Tool!
description:
Niche Research for Amazon KDP can be challenging. In this video I provide a tool that will help you to gather the data but follow the Niche Research Rules when you use Publisher Rocket or KDSPY.

Download the Tracker: https://www.globalselfpublishing.com/resources

KDSPY - Read This Before You Buy: https://rebrand.ly/KDSPY-Quick-Guide
Publisher Rocket - Read This Before You Buy: https://rebrand.ly/Publisher-Rocket-Quick-Guide

Purchase Publisher Rocket and get my $197.00, 12-Hour Course for Free
➡ visit https://www.globalselfpublishing.com/publisher-rocket-purchase
Once Publisher Rocket is purchased from the Publisher Rocket platform, you will receive an automated email from support@publisherrocket.com with the website link and details on how to access the complimentary course using the coupon code. If you have any trouble, please add a comment below, and I can check your purchase using your 'last name' details and send you an email with the details.

Purchase KDSPY Pro and get my $99.
